entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this evening. A few showers over eastern sections early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
